short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A quick and simple secure password generating service.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Identify.so provides a quick and simple secure password generating service. All passwords are generated client side using JavaScript in your web browser with no data being sent to our server. It allows you to only remember one "Master Password" yet generate unique complex passwords for all the various sites you use.

Directions:
Input a "Master Password" while the extension will determine what domain you are visiting. Press Enter and it will then generate a unique secure password for you to use with that website. By using the same "Master Password" each time, it will always generate the same complex password for you so you'll never have to remember the complex one. Use the same "Master Password" for all your sites, while it will generate a unique complex one based on the domain name.

The latest update includes updated icons and instructions.
